name: BobaGun: attack of the sushi
description:
Setup: Before playing, click "Run Game", press esc, click the fullscreen button, then click in and adjust your sensitivity with mouse wheel!

If you have any questions DM me on twitter! https://twitter.com/trashkevv

Music Credit: https://freesound.org/people/Jay_You/

How to Play

  • Protect the Soysauce from getting attacked by the Sushi Monsters!!!
    • (Soysauce are helpless idiots, keep a close eye on them)
  • Use your Straw to shoot boba pearls at the Sushi!!!
    • (Boba pearls hurt Soysauce too! be careful!!!)
    • (Refill your boba supply by finding Bubble Tea around the mall!!!)
  • Keep the Soysauce alive for as long as possible!!!
    • (The longer the game goes, the more Sushi spawn)

Controls

MoveWASDAimMouseShootLeft Mouse ButtonChange Mouse SenseScroll WheelToggle MusicMUnlock CursorEsc

Originally, this game, including all art and assets, was made in 3 days (+ a stressful 16 hours of fixing issues). Since then I have updated it some in my free time.
